description: Stylesheet for the React app managing light and dark theme colors, layout, and responsiveness.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the React application with center-aligned content and theme-based background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo element with specific height and animation for spinning.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with layout and theme-based styling.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link element styled with theme colors for visual consistency.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with visual effects on hover and active states.
